abstract: Speculation about potential deals for Yahoo, Akamai Technologies and Research in Motion were enough to spur their share prices to big gains.
snippet: Speculation about potential deals for Yahoo, Akamai Technologies and Research in Motion were enough to spur their share prices to big gains.
lead_paragraph: Three of the biggest movers among technology stocks on Wednesday were Yahoo, Akamai Technologies and Research in Motion. What do they have in common?

headline.main: The Markets Love Some Good Deal Speculation

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
